RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: farm animals wander in
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: a group of farm animals will be attracted and join the colony.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: Curious farm animals have wandered in, attracted by the commotion.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: gauranlen pod sprout
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: a Gauranlen pod will sprout at a random location on the map, if it can.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: insect jelly
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: insect jelly deposits will be deposited from underground.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: A giant insect colony underground has deposited some insect jelly.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: nearby faction goodwill
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: you will gain goodwill from the nearest faction base.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: random recruit
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: 50% chance of random recruit of the same ideoligion joining your colony.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: A wanderer has arrived and wants to join your colony.

RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.label: discover ancient complex
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.effectDesc: you will discover the location of an ancient complex nearby.
RitualAttachableOutcomeEffectDef.letterInfoText: You've discovered the location of an ancient complex.
